events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection, causing damage to the front bumper.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to manage the investigation and assist the customer throughout the process.
The customer received an acknowledgment confirming the receipt of their auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
The agent requested a police report, photos of the car damage, and insurance documents to proceed with claim validation.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and the police accident report, to support their claim.
The investigation team initiated a thorough review of the submitted documents and gathered additional evidence about the accident circumstances.
After careful examination of all evidence and statements, the investigation on the vehicle collision was completed with conclusive findings.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the assessed damages and policy coverage to facilitate a prompt resolution for the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the professionalism of the claims handling process.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement on the settlement terms and completion of all procedural requirements.
The insurance payment was successfully processed and issued to the customer to cover the damages from the auto accident.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and resolution of all outstanding issues.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived for record-keeping and future reference in accordance with company policy.
